item.description: We are moving forward and this event is becoming more exciting every day. Krista will streamline the designers to 5 and present the ones she likes best so we can secure a designer who will take part in this event. Ivo will also work on optional location ideas and fine tune potential locations for this event. I have 2 jewelry designers on standby and will present their 2013 spring lines next meeting too. Don't miss this event. RSVP today. Please add me to your Google + circle ...lorrie.pearson@yahoo.com

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: 3rd planning meeting for designer collection event.
